items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful long sweater dress!
items.body: This is a great long sweater dress. I got the brown and it is a beautiful chestnut color...perfect for fall! It is a thickish, wide ribbed material that hugs the body in all the right places. I paired it with a gold belt to give me more of a waist and gold jewelry. I will be wearing this to my niece's wedding rehearsal in late September. I bought a small and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: AFD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Love this dress. Super cute, warm and the flattering. I ran it through the washer and dryer to remove the wrinkles and it's still looks perfect. I got it in a size small and it fit great. Read more
items.author: Whitney

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color. Very form-fitting.
items.body: Very form fitting. If you want to look great in this dress, you better have a great body. The cloth is nice and quite stretchy. Read more
items.author: Anne F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Nice dress, fits well, pretty shade of pink, comfortable, good quality. True to size. I wear a size small I am 5 ft 9 weigh 132 Read more
items.author: Ronda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little black sweater dress.
items.author: Lyn Fitzpatrick

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but arrived pre-worn when sold as new
items.body: Beautiful color. I sized up because although I usually wear medium, it’s very clingy and I prefer not to see bumps! The neck seems unfinished but lays well. Biggest complaint was dress arrived minus any tags or labels and with sleeves turned inside out. Must have been returned but it’s sold as new and had obviously been tried on before. Read more
items.author: CJC658

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really nice!
items.body: Love the fabric love the fit. I am very curvy, and the fit of this dress is just beautiful.However, I ordered the brown dress thinking that it would be a beautiful rich, dark brown. It is not; it is Rust. On the fence about whether to keep this or not. Will probably order another one in a different color. Read more
items.author: Ani

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars absolute perfection
items.body: absolute perfection - so perfect I bought it in 3 colors, wore all 3 for most of my travels in Europe this past fall. Read more
items.author: Katherine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Boat Neck Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Boat Neck Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
